argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isfusgraclALT.v | |- V = ( 1st ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_relfusgra | |- Rel FinUSGrph |
| 3 |  | #P_1st2nd | |- ( ( Rel FinUSGrph /\ G e. FinUSGrph ) -> G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpan | |- ( G e. FinUSGrph -> G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 1st ` G ) e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 2nd ` G ) e. _V |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_opelvv | |- <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. e. ( _V X. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( G e. ( _V X. _V ) <-> <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. e. ( _V X. _V ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> G e. ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_isfusgraclALT | |- ( G e. ( _V X. _V ) -> ( G e. FinUSGrph <-> ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( G e. FinUSGrph <-> ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_biimpcd | |- ( G e. FinUSGrph -> ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_mpd | |- ( G e. FinUSGrph -> ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) ) |
